name: The Firlyn Stones
description:
- You can play solo.
- You can play in multiplayer mode, where you can play with friends or people around the world.
- There's an experience system that when you level up, you can access more functionalities in the game (like character customization).
- The game is an oppressive game that will make you shudder.
- The game is an adventure game that will make you explore a giant world.
- There's some synthetic ambient sounds and noises that will bewitch you.
